history.content:
The CS Advising Office will be closed for advising appointments from Monday, December 18, 2017 to Friday, January 5, 2018 for administrative reporting and auditing. 

Here are some links to common questions and concerns:

  • Getting into CS classes, please review information here.

  • Common lower division questions here and upper division questions here.

  • Information about CS major or applying to the CS major can be found here.

  • Degree Requirements, including information for transfers, can be found here.

Should you have any emergent concerns, please email us at cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu, or visit https://eecs.berkeley.edu/people/staff/student-affairs-staff.

We will be available for drop in hours this Wednesday, December 13, from 10am to 12pm and 1pm to 4pm. 

Happy winter break!
